inline.description:
1. In the "Invite People" field start typing a name of an existing user that is a member on another team
  2. Select the user in the autocomplete dropdown
  3. Click "Invite Members"
inline.expectedResult:
User is put in "Successful" section with the following details:
  • "This member has been added to the team"

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) UI Automation: Write an automated test using Cypress for "Members Invitation Flow: Add New/Existing Users" — MM-18040
